title: The Bilbao Looking Glass
description: Sarah Kelling and her art detective friend, Max Bittersohn, arrive at her Cape Cod summer home, to find a strange addition, a lovely old Bilbao looking glass. Appie Kelling brings her son, Lionel, and her four grandsons - chaos creators, but not killers. Sarah and Max battle through social prejudice and conflicting clues to again solve murder.
author: Charlotte MacLeod
